title: Didn't help
body: On the third day my dog walked up to the birdhouse and barked at it non stop.  He hates it.  After that he paid it no attention. Perhaps an effective tool for some but not for us.

title: Looks nice, but too small for anyone to confuse with ...
body: Works sometimes with neighbors dogs, but got tired of spending money on batteries.  Even though was pointed away from my dogs, worried they suffer too. Looks nice, but too small for anyone to confuse with a birdhouse.

title: Two Stars
body: did nothing at all... i have 3 dogs and it did nothing at all.

title: One Star
body: This is a complete waste of money.

title: Apparently doesn't work on all dog barks
body: Unfortunately these didn't work for me. They did not work as described. My neighbors dogs are the little rat-sized dogs, that think they are a German Shepards. Their high pitched "yip" (bark) is so damn annoying! And apparently doesn't register with the device. The test works, as I can get the sound to play when I give a practice "WOOF".

title: It works !
body: I have been using this for almost 5 years and it works !!  I think it must extend beyond the 50 foot distance. Neighbor's dog has not been driving me nuts all this time.

title: Significantly reduced my two dogs' barking
body: I use 2 for my 60' x 60' back yard. I was getting neighbor complaints about my dogs' barking. I had to replace one after about 6 years which is ok. They do go through the batteries though. I would suggest tot the manufacturer to make it possible to put 2 batteries in at a time so I have to change them less.

title: Wonderful product. We had tried everything with little to ...
body: Wonderful product.  We had tried everything with little to no success.  This worked the first time.  UPDATE:  This worked great for ~2 weeks.  Now it no longer works and our dogs are barking again.  Returning the product.

title: Works if you're dogs have good hearing
body: Well it works if you're dog can here. We have four dogs, the one constant barker is 3yrs old and it works great on him! First day he barked and it scared the day lights out of him. But as for our dogs over 10yrs old it does nothing, the box description does state that it may not work on hearing impaired dogs, we were optimistic that it might. Otherwise it's a great product of you know for sure your dog isn't hard of hearing.

title: Tool a chance and Happy I did
body: Not all products work the same on humans, why would any of us think that this product would be the same for all dogs.It worked really GREAT for our little dogs (big barkers).Husband put it down on patio table and the first dog that barked, stopped and ran in the house.Even the neighbors dogs have shut up.Actually I did not expect it to work so well.I suffer from migraines, so I am very HAPPY with this productOnly bad I can put on the CON side, is that it is made somewhat flimsy.

title: CRAPOLA
body: Did not do a darn thing.  Biggest waste of money!

title: No more annoying barking.
body: Here is a barking deterrent that really works .We couldn't even walk out into our back yard due to our neighbors two dogs constantly barking ! They would bark at anything.  This has curbed theAnnoyance and has allowed us to enjoy our home and yard again .

title: Great sevice though
body: Doesn't work as it claims. Great sevice though!

title: One Star
body: did not stop the barking dogs at all...

title: Five Stars
body: as advertised--Well packaged --Very quick shipment! Thanks

title: Like it!
body: neighbor dog not as frequent or frenzied.  Big backyard saver!  I think dog is too dumb to realize it is triggering sounds itself.

title: Nice birdhouse decoration! 
body: The light came on whenever our toy poodle barked but he hardly gave notice. We turned it on high and pointed it at him in our enclosed screen room but it didn't phase him.

title: One Star
body: RETURNED TO SENDER

title: PetSafe Outdoor Ultrasonic Bark Control Model PBC00-11216
body: I have 4 dogs  - a 7lb Chihuahua, 25lb Corgi/Rat Terrier, 40lb Pitbull, and 75lb German Shephard. They have free access to the back yard, via a doggy door, and come in and out of the house as they please. They all love a good barking, especially when they're doing it together.  They're easily triggered -- basically, anytime a neighbor, dog, or child is outside, my dogs will kick off, racing the fence line, barking & growling for all they're worth. Unfortunately, I'm surrounded by neighbors, dogs, and children, and so the dogs' barking sessions are very frequent. Their joint vocal efforts are impressive, a mayhem of sharp, shocking yips and yaps, mingled with deep, rumbling growls, and sonorous, bass-tone woofs. Add me to the mix, shouting at the dogs to be quiet, and you can probably imagine the suffering of all who live within earshot of me, having to endure repeated barking/shouting cycles, over and over, all weekend long.I don't enjoy being a horrible neighbor, but I didn't know how to stop the aggressive, unwelcome barking. My dogs get lots of exercise & attention & are usually nice, social dogs -- I think the barking was just fun, pack-style. I wanted it to stop, but I didn't want to restrict their freedom by closing the doggy door, or hurt or frighten them by using bark collars. I tried silent sprays, which had no effect. A noisy spray, Stop That, had good reviews & did stop the barking, but it caused my Corgi to shake with fear for hours afterwards, and I threw it away. I considered the PetSafe Outdoor Ultrasonic Bark Control Deterrent many times, but was put off by the negative reviews. In the end, because I was desperate and couldn't find any good alternative, I bought it, and I am so glad I did, because I really think it's working! My yard is about 90 ft x 30 ft, so it sits on the ground, about midpoint. It's been about 3 weeks, and the dogs still bark, but much less frequently. When they start, I don't interfere, but just wait for the barking to peter out, which it does, fairly quickly. I have it on a low setting. The dogs don't seem afraid at all & don't even appear to notice it. They spend as much time as ever in the yard & on the deck. I also have cats who like to be in the back yard, and it doesn't bother them at all, either.So far so good!Ito peter out, which it does, fairly quickly. I have it on a low setting. The dogs don't seem afraid at all & don't even appear to notice it. They spend as much time as ever in the yard & on the deck. I also have cats who like to be in the back yard, and it doesn't bother them at all, either.So far so good!I

While they played and made little soft growling sounds apparently it would go off.My new rescue dog was so afraid of the sound she refused to go outside.I am trying to see if someone else wants it.

title: So far he's not barking after his initial bark!!
body: I received this one day ago, installed the 9 volt battery, used setting 2, and selected a place to put it. We have a very large backyard and are surrounded by five neighbors, some who also have dogs as we do. However, the dog to our south barks loudly whenever we are in the backyard, while the other neighbor's dogs do not. Once the unit was in its place the dog started to bark then stopped. It's very hot outside and maybe our neighbor called his dog in...perhaps, but the dog only barks once each time I went out then he quit barking.I'll let you know it his barking starts again but so far he's not barking after his initial bark!!.

title: May work for you but not for us.
body: Didn't work for our stubborn dog.  Somehow he is figuring out that we don't want him barking a lot and especially after dark.  Now if we could keep the deer out of the yard  next door all would be well.

body: Had high hopes to silence my neighbor's dog, but not a chance.  I can only combat this hound by neutralizing his incessant booming barks by loudly playing music to drowned him out.

title: Hope you own stock in  9V batteries
body: I have purchased 2 of these to control my dog's barking when other dogs pass by our property.The device works great for less than a week (usually 3-4 days). Then the batteries are dead and need replacing. I have spent over $150 in batteries alone (Duracells - not the cheap ones). I would think the company would be able to figure out a way to have the batteries last longer than that. Initially, I thought the product was defective and sent a note to the company. PetSafe replied that depending on how much and often the dog barks and when you have it set to turn on/off determines battery life. Their suggestion: turn it off when not in use. REALLY? Just want it on while I am at work and they still do not last even a week. Disappointing, as the 1st couple days it works well.

title: Well worth the money.

title: Tranquil and no longer sleep deprived
body: I am thrilled with this product! I'm pretty sure it saved my dog's life, and I know it saved our relationship. Recently I rescued a young mutt loose in my neighborhood. I tried for days to find his owner. He had a collar and tag on, but no answer to the phone, until once. The voice one the other end said "NO" and hung up. I quickly found out why. This dog is extremely high strung and literally screams at a VERY high pitch...constantly! Neighbors were beginning to complain, and I knew a visit from Animal Control was not far off. A friend told me about seeing your "PetSafe Bark Deterrent", and being desperate (and sleep deprived) I ordered 2, as my property is large. What a difference it has made. He starts to "wind up", and when he gets to a certain level he stops and calms down immediately. I have other dogs to and it keeps them in check as well. Thanks to this product, we are all sleeping thru the night and I'm no longer getting threatening comments from neighbors. Because of these cute little Bird Houses our ranch is tranquil once again, and "Foley" is alive and settling into his new home nicely!

title: Bought this to hopefully, stop my inconsiderate neighbors 10 ...
body: Bought this to hopefully, stop my inconsiderate neighbors 10 large dogs from barking! They used to allow their dogs to bark 24/7!! No matter how many times we asked them kindly do something about their dogs barking. WE could not even walk out in our backyard with all of them coming to fence and barking at us! Put this device next to the fence we share, on a shepherds hook. And, of course the dogs saw me they all came running up to me and started barking their heads off!! I turned it on...then the dogs backing away and barking lower! Then they ran to the very back of their property and stayed for the rest of the day!! Success after 3 years of torture from these dogs barking!! Will be buying a couple of more and put them all up and down the fence line!! Thanks PetSafe!

title: Life Changing
body: This was amazing.  My dog barked constantly when he was outside and he quit the very second we put this outside.  What a life saver and our neighbors are even happier than we are.  However it does not work on my little Pomeranian for some reason.  Great for a big Irish setter though!!!!

title: Amazing because she is hardwired (by breed
body: Oh my gosh, this thing actually works!! I was hesitant because the review are either 'it's great' or 'it didn't work'. It worked immediately with my 2 yr old dog. She barked two times, then paused and barked once more for the first two nights, two barks the 3rd and 4th night and basically nothing after that. She barely goes out once or twice a week now and when she does go out she typically doesn't bark and she comes right back in. Amazing because she is hardwired (by breed...rat terrier and cattle dog mix) to bark at the opossums that walk along our fences at night. Every night she would get up multiple times to bark like crazy at the opossums. It was almost every hour. It was driving us nuts and we weren't getting good sleep. I highly recommend this item. For less than $50 bucks it's worth the gamble. I will actually take it with us when we travel with her to deter any barking.

title: Really works!
body: Next door neighbor's dog would bark from sunrise to sunset and beyond. Neighbors wouldn't/couldn't do anything to stop the continuous barking. Didn't think this Outdoor Bark Deterrent would work but to my surprise it stopped the barking within 30 seconds of placing it outside. I took the unit down 2 hours later and haven't heard a bark for two days.  Definitely recommend this unit. Worth twice the price.

title: Burns through batteries pretty quickly, and seems to activate at times without ...
body: Burns through batteries pretty quickly, and seems to activate at times without barking or any loud noise -- and it drives our dogs crazy when it does that.  I wound up removing it from our lawn and hanging it on our back fence for the benefit of the neighbor's dog, which barks and starts our dogs barking.  Situation seems to be somewhat better after moving it and redirecting its sound output.

Those dogs barked balls over and over and didn't stop them once.

title: even if it eats batteries it is worth 5 stars
body: The dog started barking at me.  I turned on this "birdhouse" The dog was confused, it tried barking quieter... still got blasted... it stopped barking and returned to his porch.  I stayed outside for a couple of hours, the dog must have gotten bored and decided to try barking at me again. It charged the fence, barked once, and returned to his porch.5 stars... even if it eats batteries it is worth 5 stars.  (I'm not sure yet as I have only had it one day.)

body: this does work, matter of fact- so well that when I mow over by it-it goes off and my dog runs off and looks at me like " I didn't bark dad", replace the battery offen is the only negative thing about it.

title: One Star
body: seems to be a waste of money

title: saved my sanity is not an overstatement!
body: SO THANKFUL this bark deterrent device saved my sanity. I am not kidding! I work from home and was being driven absolutely up the wall by the neighbor's dogs incessantly barking ALL day long. I love dogs but I don't want to be in a mental institution because of them.  I tried a cheaper device and it didn't work or didn't have the range necessary, plus I could occasionally hear a sound emitting from it, which was worrisome. I could tell this one worked from day one, and I can always tell when the batteries need replacing because the barking begins again. I would definitely recommend this to anyone whose quality of life is greatly diminished by uncontrolled barking.

title: Dont buy it!
body: I bought two of it to guarantee that our dogs Worldwide stop barking and anoying our neighbordhood. Unfortunatelly they did not work at all.

title: Worked on one dog, but not completely on the other.
body: The problem with the neighbor dogs is actually the owner being a complete dumba$$, leaving the dogs tied on short strings all day in the sun with little water and food and NO affection so they bark and bark and bark. With no animal welfare laws here, it didn't seem fair to poison them and there are definitely rules about poisoning the owner so I needed another solution. I bought this and hoped. It kind of worked in that the yelpy mutt has stopped barking and yelping but the pit-bull cross seems to be able to bark through the pain. I swear, if you could translate it, the dog is shouting "my ears hurt, my ears hurt". However the incessant all night barking seems to have stopped so that's good.Now if PetSafe could just invent something to shut my stupid neighbor's music up, I would be in paradise!

title: Two Stars
body: it goes off with my husbands voice and one dog shakes, can't use it

title: Three Stars
body: its ok

title: The Sensor Range is Weak
body: We bought this because we have a big noisy dog next door. It works great, when it picks up that the dog is barking next door. When the dog finally sets off the sensor, it works really well. But, getting the sensor to go off is another challenge. We have tried moving it around the yard three separate times. There is no way it has a range of 50 ft. The sound may emit that far, but the sensor has about a 10 foot range, if that. On top of that, the dog will learn how quiet he can bark without setting off the sensor. I do love the way to program the time. Our battery lasts about a month, which is really nice. It wasn't as effective as we were hoping.

title: Batteries not included
body: It is, of course, useless without the battery, and, of course, no battery is included.  Wouldn't want to make an acceptable "out of the box" experience - not in today's world.

title: ... had it for about 3 days and it seems like it is working
body: We've had it for about 3 days and it seems like it is working. We have two dogs. A lab and a shepherd mix. They use to bark at everything. People walking by, neighbors outside, boats going by. Now when the neighbors are out the lab will bark about two times then stop. The shepherd mix doesn't bark. Very happy that we for got it. If I was our neighbors, I would be annoyed at all the barking.

title: Worked like a charm!
body: i work nights and my dog uses a doggie door.  She has some sepration anxiety and i caught her on video cam barking one night outside ,  i tried the citronella collar one day and observed for a few hours on camera before leaving her alone all night with it. It worked but would spray her even if she  scratched near it and she is very timid so dont want her being afraid all day while I am gone and getting sprayed.  Then ......to option 2 the ultrasonic device.  Well let me tell you ...... It works !  First bark outside and she came run ing in the doggie door like she just saw a ghost.  She tried barking again and same thing.  Aince then no more barking outside.  I did this while i was home as did not want her alone the firat time in case it scared her.  She is a Lhasa mix and very timid so if you have a timid dog , or a very sensitive dog like her this will work.  She used to go outside and join in the neighborhood barkfest , now she wants nothing to do with it.  Solved my problem and I feel much better that she is able to still bark in the house if she wants , I am just able to control where she barks with this device.  My sisters Shitzu was here and barked and it went off and it didnt even phase her, she just kinda went " hmm whats that?"  So it depends on your dogs personality Whethere this will deter him or her.  It definitely detered mine, although I did not like seeing her scared but at least I was here.  It has an on off switch so I only turn it on when I am at work as it can be pretty sensitive to things like motorcycles driving by and other noises.  My neighbors have barking dogs and it doesnt go off with them as there is a brick wall between.  I bought a wire  hanger stake thing to put in ground at the dollar store and it hangs on there well at perfect height.

title: Do NOT recommend you WASTE your month on this
body: Within 22 hours, our dogs were baking their heads off right by this device.  Do NOT recommend you WASTE your month on this.

title: Five Stars
body: It served the purpose most of the time. It stopped almost all the barking.

body: Work's well in calming down the dog behind us.  The effect isn't immediate.  It takes a few minutes for the barking to stop.

title: Very disappointed
body: Did not work after trying 3 batteries so returnrd it which cost £12. Not happy and have not received refund yet.

title: Dogs became Immune immediately
body: Worked for two days but then my dogs became immune

title: One Star
body: It worked for 2 days and the dogs went back to barking

title: Worked Great....for 3 days.
body: Worked great for like 3 days, then it didn't deter the dog at all, she went right back to barking.

title: Two Stars
body: It worked for about 5 days.

title: It didn't work. Sent it back. I placed ...
body: It didn't work. Sent it back. I placed this unit about 3' from the barking dog, she became more aggressive, barked more.

title: Was great while it lasted though
body: Worked for a while. Then my dogs got used to it. Was great while it lasted though!

title: One Star
body: returned

title: Five Stars
body: This one worked great on the neighbor's dog ! Peace at last!

title: Aussies
body: Did not work on our Australia Shepherds.

title: Five Stars
body: Worked perfectly.

title: Not Highway Noise Immune
body: Best used in a quiet area. The highway sets it off all the time. The battery was dead after five day's. Otherwise I believe it works well.

title: Don't waste your time. . .
body: Nope, doesn't work at all.  My dogs barked away and acted as if they didn't hear it at all.  What a waste.  Thank goodness Amazon has a great return policy.

title: Absolutely no effect on barking
body: This product did absolutely nothing to reduce or stop my dog  from barking.  Very frustrated.  Would like to return it. 😞  I really wanted to give this NO stars but this site wouldn't allow that.

title: Did not work
body: Did not stop dog from barking at all.

title: Peace and Quiet
body: We bought this only hoping it would help with the neighbors rescued 3 year old retriever, she would bark at us non-stop when we were out doors.  She would bark at any sound in the neighborhood IF her family was not at home which is most of the day as they all work or are in school.  We had mentioned the barking to them and they didn't believe us!  Lucky for us this Bark Deterrent worked the day we hung it between the houses! Now if she hears us she will sit and watch,  of course we go and pet here. We ordered one for our daughter and they have 3 barking dogs next to them, worked the first time and they also didn't bark at the cat.I have also sent one to my sister who has 4 barking dogs next door to her I have no doubt it will work.

title: Wish I could say this worked for us. I ...
body: Wish I could say this worked for us.  I worked incredibly well for 2 days.... total silence... then they just barked right through it....

title: So sad
body: We have a two year old lab mix; product has no effect at all. Too bad.

title: Nice product, will work for smaller more sensitive breeds
body: It seems to work good at first but it might just be that I have a very stubborn dog.  Depending on the animal seems to lose its effect overtime I even plugged it in to a 9V  AC to DC adapter  so that it would have constant power and wouldn't have to worry about changing batteries every week.  It does work, however for my situation I think the dog knows how to get around it.

title: PLEASE do not waste your money on this item
body: PLEASE do not waste your money on this item. I have a very obnoxious barking dog next door and this product does NOTHING, Absolutely NOTHING. How this product can even be sold is just ridiculous.

title: One Star
body: Worthless. Does not work at all

title: Works better than expected
body: I didn't have really high hopes for this, but I have two separate neighbor dogs that like to go to war where their privacy fence meets, a young Mastiff Vs a young German Shepherd. They'd go at it all day! I put this up on the one of the fence posts near the corner where they go at it. It's not an ideal location because it's all 8 foot fencing. Still, it has helped! The German Shepherd hates it, and has mostly stopped barking at the Mastiff, who is too stupid to pay much attention to the device. The shepherd is much quieter overall, so it really affects him. Taking that dog out of the fence war means the mastiff doesn't have anyone to get angry with, so she's much quieter as well. It's not 100% There is still an occasional skirmish, but I'm happy about the results so far.

title: Five Stars
body: Works well. No more neighbors barking dogs. (4)

title: WASTE OF MONEY!
body: If I could give this product no stars, I would.  It is flimsy and cheap and DOES NOT WORK!!  Don't waste your money!

title: USELESS
body: USELESS.  Doesn't deter any dogs from barking.  Have tried numerous of them in different locations and with different dogs.  Do yourself a favor and buy an inexpensive bark collar.

title: Short lived  50 bucks
body: I will  that have had this item just over a month and the little cone shaped disc in the center of the ultra sonic emitter came detached so now it does not seem to work.. Of course its past Amazons 30 day return /policy  so I give a zero for durability . Rather disappointing  to have some thing last so short a time that I really never got the chance to see if it works. As far as I am concerned some one owes me a new one . .

title: Not worth the $
body: Not effective after about a week...

title: One Star
body: Doesn't seem to make a difference at all.  I can hear it but the dogs don't seem to care

title: Works good and I am much happier with out barking dogs.
body: This device does decrease the amount of barking that I normally would here. Dogs will bark but not nearly as long as they barked before. A great training device for dogs.

title: One Star
body: We have yappy annoying small dogs next door.  This did not help at all (most unfortunately)!!

title: Woof Woof Silence.... Woof Woof Silence....  I'm happy!
body: Doggie Fence Line Wars, my 3 and their 2, you can imagine the noise!  My poor neighbors!  I believe this product is working great as a deterrent.  The dogs will start barking and then stop.  They will continue this sequence several times and then there is peace!  The battery died once and we were afraid the dogs had overcome or gotten used to the deterrent sound but we replaced the battery and all is peaceful.  All of the dogs had gotten pretty aggressive with each other at the fence line and we were really afraid one of them would get hurt so this product has been wonderful for our situation.

title: No Custoimer Sevice
body: T bought this to stop my neighbors dogs from barking whenever I was outside. They never stopped barking. At first it seemed to work. But there were five dogs all barking constantly. I think some of them were affected by the PetSafe but were too stupid to stop. The neighbor was no help in controling the barking, sometimes when she arrived home at midnight the dogs would all bark. They barked so much that the 9 volt battery would only last about a week and a half. I decided to get a 9 volt battery elimator and run it on house electric in an effort to save batterys. It didn't stop the dogs from barking. Finally the PetSafe burned out! This was before the one year warranty expired. I called PetSafe and was told before I could return the unit I needed to replace the battery and conduct a test over the phone with the customer service rep. I reported to them that the green light was flashing coinstantly which showed a fault. "Sorry you must conduct the twst first call us back when you are ready." At this point I concluded there is no customer service or replacement with this company. I rated this one star because I'm not sure if it worked. I would not recommend this product based on lack of customer service.

title: Emitted Tone does not deter barking
body: The device works in the sense that a loud noise does trigger the device to emit a high pitched sound. However, this does NOT prevent my two dogs from barking. I bought two devices even though for the area I needed only one. I have two dogs that run along the inside of our front yard fence and bark at everyone that walks by. One dog is 135 pounds and the other 25 pounds. Therefore, we have the full spectrum of bark levels (loud and deep as well as higher pitch barking). I hung one of these devices on our front gate and my big dog literally barked into it like a microphone. I could see the little indicator light turn on as the device registered the bark and emitted its tone. It did nothing to deter either one of my dogs from barking.I had high hopes and am now out of a big chunk of change. Save your money and put it toward dog training instead!

title: Dont really know if this is working or not. ...
body: Dont really know if this is working or not. It seems that the Ultrasonic Bark Deterrent has only work for the one dog and not the other. Will keep it on and see if there is any change on the long run.

title: amazing
body: Can't believe how good it works if you combine it with shock collars 100% silence. If forced to pick just one I would take this over shock collars (yes I know that is hard to believe) but I have found with shock collars unless perfectly positioned on the voice box of dog they are not 100% consistent this device is and they learn!

title: The device worked a few days until the dogs figured ...
body: The device worked a few days until the dogs figured it out and return to barking, but not as much.

title: One Star
body: our shih tzus are not deterred at all by this birdhouse

title: Works like a charm!!!! 
body: AWESOME!!! Worth every penny! I have a very vocal pembroke welsh corgi and it only took him barking twice to learn! I read other reviews before purchasing that stated batteries where an issue-not so in my case same batteries in for a month and still working( it has a test feature). And it's working on neighboring dogs too! I have mine hung on a shepards hook plant hanger in my garden aimed at my dogs favorite barking spot about 3 feet off the ground works like a charm!!!

title: not sure its working on the pia dogs that bark ...
body: not sure its working on the pia dogs that bark way to much. Keeping my fingers crossed. Will report back once I see some change.

title: Eats up batteries fast. Did work for a couple ...
body: Eats up batteries fast. Did work for a couple weeks then dogs ignored it or it quit working, i don't know, us humans can't hear it

title: I have already recommended this product to others who have a dog that ...
body: I have two medium size dogs (Australian Shepherds), of which 1 is a constant barker.  A leaf, a squirrel, the neighbor, etc.  I have hung the Bark Deterrent and immediately the barking has ceased.  She barks once at someone passing too closely to the yard, but then ceases her previous constant barking.This has held up well to the high Kansas winds and heavy Spring rainfalls, without fail.  I have already recommended this product to others who have a dog that barks as mine, and I would definitely and will definitely purchase this item again, should it become damaged or fail to perform.

title: I immediately put a battery in and hung it on ...
body: I immediately put a battery in and hung it on a branch of the tree that is centrally located where the neighbors' and our dogs usually have a bark-off on the setting 2. All of them got one bark off and then separated. These are small dogs. Mine is a toy poodle and the neighbors dogs are Samoyeds.

title: Great at first, but then....
body: In the beginning, I was amazed. It worked so well and I thought it was the answer to my dog's barking. However, after less than a month, my dog appears to have adjusted and he does not seem to be bothered by it. Tried to get refund from manufacturer, but was told the product wasn't defective, it was just that some dogs adjust to it. I guess I should have figured it was too good to be true! Waste of money for me.

title: Doesn't work, dog doesn't care at all.
body: Did not work AT ALL.  My dog barked right through it.  Never even paused.  I tried for weeks to make this work.  My cats DID react to it though and ran away so please keep it away from cats.

title: works well on neighbor's 5lb yippy dog
body: It's only day 3 since I hooked it up, so I can't speak for long-term results.  But on day 1 it was already VERY effective to quiet my neighbor's little yippy dog.  I was worried that it wouldn't work based on all the prior reviews, but it does.  I ran a power cord out to the fence line and I wired up a 9v AC adapter to a battery connector so my unit never needs the battery changed.  I didn't even bother to hang it up.  its sitting on some bricks about face-level to the little dog.  I have it a foot or two back from the chainlink fence.Prior to setting it up, the little dog would bark non-stop all day and night whenever he was outside.  He prefers sitting close to my yard because he can see through it to bark at cars and joggers.  This means that I was able to set up the unit within feet of his favorite yipping perch.  Right away, I can see that he's associated the barking with the sound produced by the unit.  He'll let out an apprehensive bark now like he knows he's gonna get blasted with the high-pitched noise from this product.  And once he gets blasted, he shuts up.  I've got my fingers crossed that it continues to work this well.  If it doesn't then i'll try to come back and update this.

title: Dog still barking!!!!
body: They don't seem to make a difference. I have been using this one outside and also the indoor one. Dogs still barking up a storm. :( These bark boxes are a piece of crap. I used them for at least a month and they did no good at all. Unforunately I waited to long to return them.

title: Works if you can be creative.
body: We have 3 dogs. 2 of the dogs it works for and the other one it made her howl more at first. The trick is to put the howler inside while the other 2 are outside.  In order to get it to work for the howler I would take her outside alone. Once it went off I would let it do work once and then turn it off. It took a while but she finally figured it out. Making this work may take some time and getting creative.

title: Five Stars
body: It works.

title: Three Stars
body: Really so-so. Seemed to work at first, but then stopped quickly.

title: Bought this to use against our neighbor's dog. It ...
body: Bought this to use against our neighbor's dog.  It seemed to work at first, but eventually it either lost strength or the dog got used to it.  Giving 3 stars because it is functional, but docking 2 for effectiveness.  I'd probably save your money.

title: One Star
body: Did not work for my yorkie, disappointed

title: Awesome!
body: Fast shipment.  The neighbor's dog doesn't even come outside as much and the barking has decreased considerably.  Good investment!

title: Don't waste your money .
body: Dogs wouldn't even notice it, I used a similar product before that really worked, but it was manual, so I thought that for the price this was going to be better, what a waste of money.

title: Five Stars
body: seems to work for noisy neighbor dog/hung closer to ground level as recommended

title: We have a Treeing Walker Coonhound that barks at everything ...
body: We have a Treeing Walker Coonhound that barks at everything and we were really hoping this would be the answer to the problem, but it isn't.  It does not work.  Now he barks at the bark deterrent device.

title: I was so hoping this would work on our neighbors ...
body: I was so hoping this would work on our neighbors dogs who are just behind the fence in our back yard.  They are small yappy dogs, and I read other people's reviews saying that these bark control items don't work as well on small yappy dogs but I was willing to give it a try, as I am at my wit's end.  Unfortunately, the item worked on the big dog next door who is a lab and our own dog who is a border collie, but did not seem to have any effect on the small chihuahua type dogs next door.  It would go off, and we could see it was working, but they paid no mind.  They actually had to be really close for it to go off though, and if they were more than a few feet away the item would not even go off with the small dogs.

title: Worked through glass 15' away.
body: The most obnoxious, unbelievably loud little chihuahua imaginable indoors behind a single pane of glass in our neighbor's second story above our patio barked continually for hours on end destroying any sense of peace. Mounted it below our second story window, about 15' from our neighbor's window and it worked immediately. Like others described, first time he heard the high frequency response to his barks he stopped immediately and has tried a only a few times since. Now almost complete silence rarely testing his bark.

title: This thing actually worked!
body: My Grandmother had an issue at her house where the 4 dogs next door to her were barking non-stop plus jumping the fence over to her back yard. I bought this for her, put it near the fence (pointing towards the neighbor's yard) and after a few minutes the barking subsided. I went to visit her after one week and the barking was reduced 90%. I visited her again after 2 weeks and only heard one bark in 3.5 hours. Grandma reported to me that the dogs did not jump the fence even once during the 2 weeks the bark deterrent was in place. I normally don't write reviews, but was so impressed with this product that I had to let anyone considering purchasing to know that we had great success with this product.

title: Useless
body: This item does not work. Do not waste your money

title: Very disappointed.: (
body: I bought this product due to the ratings shown and in high hopes that it would help my barking terrier and frenchy. It didn't help at all and if I could return it I would. Very disappointed. :( :( :(

title: Not convinced it helped
body: Delivered timely but I don't think it helped and you really go through a lot of batteries.

title: Two Stars
body: Battery dies very quickly and didn't seem to affect my dog after the first day

title: Five Stars
body: fast and works well

title: Not convinced this is the real thing
body: I was hopeful that this product would put an end to the little yapping dog next door.  I installed it properly, followed all instructions, had it quite close to where the dog barks and although initially (like maybe a day or two) it may have worked the dog doesn't seem to pay attention anymore and continues to yap. I am going to try new batteries and see what happens but I only have had the thing for a few months so if I need to replace the batteries 4-5 times a year I would suggest trying something else like a hand held dog whistle........my human batteries don't burn out that fast.

title: Simply awesome
body: Buy this. Don't wait another day listening  to the dogs bark. This is the second one I've had-- and it works amazingly well. Seriously, you will love how well it works right out of the box

title: frustrating results
body: my expectation was that the disturbing dog stooped immediately. However, after three weeks, and many attempts : placing the equipment in several distinct places, changing the intensity of signal, testing it several times, with no results, the battery was over, and the dog's bad habit of continuously barking did not change. I have replaced the battery two days ago, hoping that this time worked better. No satisfactory results so far, despite of the additional $45 as handling+transportation+importation costs I had.

title: Disappointed.
body: Did not work at all!! Disappointed.

title: This product is ok at best. It didn't deter our neighbors dogs from barking ...
body: This product is ok at best. It didn't deter our neighbors dogs from barking even at close range. Our dog would be hit or miss with it.

title: One Star
body: did not work want to send it back and get refunded

title: Don't Buy for small dogs.
body: Doesn't work for the little sh*ts next door. Turning up the outside radios REAL loud or spraying them with the garden hose the only way to control nuisances like these.

title: One Star
body: It does not work.

title: Works for us!
body: It's certainly calmed our neighbours dogs down. They used to bark incessantly for up to an hour. Now they've stopped barking within minutes. It's certainly created a better home environment for us!

title: Five Stars
body: Seems to work

title: Didn't work for my dog
body: I have a German Shepherd/Golden mix. He's a very smart dog and mostly obedient but certainly has a mind of his own. He barks whenever someone walks by or another animal is out. We tried this product after being cited by Animal Control with his barking. Once it was placed, which was about 10 ft. from where he was standing, he began to bark, the ultrasonic noise began, he just paused and continued barking. Absolutely zero effect...other than he noticed it.

title: Works great! I'm so glad to have the dogs not ...
body: Works great! I'm so glad to have the dogs not barking constantly! I will be buying a couple more to put in other areas of the yard.
